definitions: (of a part or feature of something) able to be omitted or passed over so as to get to the next part or feature

examples.text: if TV ads were skippable, people would skip them

shortDefinitions: able to be omitted or passed over

definitions: (of an activity, event, etc.) not worth doing or attending

examples.text: breakfast might seem skippable if you're in a hurry, but don't cut it out
why did elite men's players treat the Olympics as a skippable event?
